data.text: Maanɔɠɔ ɠa Samali ʋɛ,
Mazɔlɔɔ wɛlɛ, ɠuluɓa ɠila ka Maliɠii yeema daalɔɠɔma,
Kɔɠɔlomai ɠa wo da,
Tufa waa vɔɔi, é ga ná-kɔbu ani ʋagɔi,
Naama volo ná,
Zɔi é tukpɔi ɠaaleʋezu,
Wɛlɛ tanigaani ba, dɔɔi ti loai ya,
Ta-laɓaliiti pɛ gaaɠoloɠologa ga unpiligiti,
Ti ɠɛni ma: «Ɓɛ ɠa Ezayi kɛɛzu eɠɛ a ɠɛ kalasu?
Devei la devei maazu, devei la devei maazu,
Za ʋoluma, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɗa ɓɔɛ niima nuɓusɛiti pɔ
É ɠɛni ti ma: «Dooɠo bosuʋɛ ɠaa.
Ti ɠaazu, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠa ɠɛ ga:
Naa ɠa é ba, à woilo Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI laawooi ma,
Wɛlɛ nii ɠa wo bosu:
Naa ɠa é ba, Maliɠii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠɛ:
Nà kɔɠɔ galui ɠa ɠɛ ga sɔledai,
Wa-minazeɠegi ɠa ɠoloɠolo
Teʋe daa ɠilagila, toɠa wo zo,
Betei ɠa ɓuɠa gola ga nu ʋa zakpamaale su,
Mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa wuzeɠe,
À yeeɠulana wa-ɠimalala ɲɛɛɠulasui zu.
À woilo dɛɛ gòoi ma!
Tii ɠɛ nui ɓɛ ɠa a ɗa yɛ nɔ wozawolii ɠa ɠɔ,
Kɛlɛ kpega ʋoluma zooi ɠaa ɠɛ sɔli,
Ʋelei a ziɛ la, naama leveiti kana,
Nu la ɗa ga ɓenɛi ɠaaloa ga kaʋa loɠa wulu zɛpɛgi,
Nu ɠa ɗa moloi vukɔ pɛ, é ʋa ɓului zɔlɔɔ,
Naa pɛ ka zɔlɔɔsu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ya, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii,
